2021-04-05.prompt: Are you usually early or late to appointments?

2021-04-06.prompt: Can you swim? How did you learn?

2021-04-07.prompt: What's your favorite interview question to ask or answer?

2021-04-08.prompt: What piece of entertainment do you wish you could erase from your mind so that you could experience it for the first time again?

2021-04-09.prompt: What do you folks think our jobs will be like in 20-25 years time? Will humans be replaced entirely? Will we still have jobs?

2021-04-12.prompt: What would you do if we started a 20% time? <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/20%25_Project>

2021-04-13.prompt: What would be your first question after waking up from being cryogenically frozen for 100 years?

2021-04-14.prompt: What is the longest you've been offline?

2021-04-15.prompt: What do you spend the most time thinking about?

2021-04-16.prompt: What’s the best thing that happened to you last week?

2021-04-19.prompt: What's your goal for the day?

2021-04-20.prompt: Is moving to a new country something you have done, have considered, or is it off the table? Why?

2021-04-21.prompt: Read for 30 minutes today. What did you read about?

2021-04-22.prompt: Name one process that stops you from getting things done fast.

2021-04-23.prompt: What could you give a 40-minute presentation on with absolutely no preparation?

2021-04-26.prompt: How would you describe the meeting culture in your team? Are you cool with that? What is your favorite alternative to scheduling a meeting?

2021-04-27.prompt: What are some of your favorite games to play?

2021-04-28.prompt: If you had all the time and energy and money and equipment and help you needed, what personal project would you launch?

2021-04-29.prompt: What was your best / worst camping trip?

2021-04-30.prompt: What did you last Google for?

2021-05-03.prompt: Where are you planning to go for your next vacation?

2021-05-04.prompt: What would you do if you had Friday's off for the summer?

2021-05-05.prompt: How do you setup your phone home screen? Share a picture.

2021-05-06.prompt: Without using the title of your job, tell me what you do.

2021-05-07.prompt: Have you taken a holiday this year? Do you have a plan for one?

2021-05-10.prompt: What's your favorite Slack channel, and why? (Not including this one.)

2021-05-11.prompt: What’s your favorite way to spend time outdoors?

2021-05-12.prompt: What is something you would rename? Could be anything, a restaurant, a country.

2021-05-13.prompt: Quiet time. Our schedules are often packed with meetings. How do you get quiet time alone to just step back and think?

2021-05-17.prompt: What has made you smile in the past 24 hours?

2021-05-18.prompt: At some point in your career you did something and thought, "That was cool! I rocked it!" Tell us about it.

2021-05-19.prompt: What desktop / smartphone / tablet app do you use that you are surprised more folk don't know about?

2021-05-20.prompt: What emoji would your team or coworkers choose to represent you and why?

2021-05-21.prompt: Do you live close to your family? How often do you see them?

2021-05-24.prompt: What do you wish you were better at?

2021-05-25.prompt: What did you accomplish yesterday? Did you achieve your goal?

2021-05-26.prompt: How do you carve out time to watch videos, read books and otherwise focus on your own development?

2021-05-27.prompt: What books do you re-read? Why?

2021-05-28.prompt: What apps can you not live without?

2021-05-31.prompt: What skills would you like to develop right now?

2021-06-01.prompt: How good are you at drawing?

2021-06-02.prompt: What outdoor activity haven't you tried, but would like to?

2021-06-03.prompt: What would you do if you were given one billion dollars?

2021-06-04.prompt: Tell us about something you learned outside of work that's made you better at your job.

2021-06-07.prompt: What is your favorite comfort food meal? Is there something so simple to make that it doesn't feel like cooking? A specific menu item that you have delivered? Bonus points for pictures!

2021-06-08.prompt: Share a pic of what you're doing.

2021-06-09.prompt: What activity do you wish you could add to your daily work day, or make more time for? What do you wish you could eliminate?

2021-06-10.prompt: What do you think would be the most useful thing you could do with virtual reality?

2021-06-11.prompt: What’s motivating for you right now?

2021-06-14.prompt: What songs hit you with a wave of nostalgia every time you hear them?

2021-06-15.prompt: Share a picture of your child / pet / something else important.

2021-06-16.prompt: What's the last thing that changed your mind?

2021-06-17.prompt: Do you take walks regularly? Go take a walk. Share a picture from your walk.

2021-06-18.prompt: You start your day and suddenly find all meetings cancelled, scheduled discussions delayed, etc, freeing up your entire day. How would you use this time?

2021-06-21.prompt: What's your favorite thing about the city / town you live in?

2021-06-22.prompt: How are you making the boat go faster? Context: <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VlTfbGemGcM>

2021-06-23.prompt: How good are you at taking care of plants?

2021-06-24.prompt: You are in an elevator and a stranger asks what you do. What do you tell them?

2021-06-25.prompt: What workplace superpower (not like flying, but like zero-cost task switching or the ability to perfectly read the room) have you observed in others and wish you could acquire/learn?

2021-06-28.prompt: Tell us a song lyric that describes how you feel right now.

2021-06-30.prompt: How do you keep track of things? I mean *all the things.* How do you grab and remember the vast array of things are zipping past you every day. Todo lists? Productivity software? Aggressive inbox gymnastics?

2021-07-01.prompt: If you were dictator of a small island nation, what crazy dictator stuff would you do?

2021-07-02.prompt: What’s a book you’ve been meaning to read, but haven't yet?

2021-07-05.prompt: If you could safely eat any inedible object, what would it be?

2021-07-06.prompt: What technology devices do you use? How do you use them? e.g. gaming PC, iPad in the evening, no computers on weekends, etc.

2021-07-07.prompt: What is something you can never seem to finish?

2021-07-08.prompt: If you had a 6 month sabbatical to work on whatever you wanted, what would you do?

2021-07-09.prompt: What would your perfect room look like?

2021-07-13.prompt: What’s the longest you've worked at a job?

2021-07-14.prompt: What do you want to do when you retire?

2021-07-15.prompt: What do you buy way more of than most people?

2021-07-16.prompt: What other position do you believe you could fill at work if not your own?

2021-07-19.prompt: Tell us a song lyric that describes your day.

2021-07-20.prompt: What one talk/video would you recommend we watch?

2021-07-21.prompt: What’s your go to casino game?

2021-07-22.prompt: If you could go somewhere for 2 weeks by yourself, where would you go and why?

2021-07-23.prompt: What normally tries to distract you during the day and how do you manage it?

2021-07-26.prompt: What was the best birthday you ever had? Why?

2021-07-27.prompt: What irrational fear do you have?

2021-07-28.prompt: What is the most recent book or film you finished? How would you review it?

2021-07-29.prompt: Which book did you read in college or high school that was actually interesting enough that you still think or talk about it sometimes?

2021-07-30.prompt: What new tool / startup / idea / etc have you seen lately that was revolutionary, that made you go wow? The more obscure, the better.

2021-08-02.prompt: What do you like shopping for? What do you hate shopping for?

2021-08-03.prompt: What household chore do you actually enjoy?

2021-08-04.prompt: Do you eat food that’s past its expiration date?

2021-08-05.prompt: What are your top 3 favorite books?

2021-08-09.prompt: If you could have a wild animal as a pet, what would it be?

2021-08-10.prompt: Look around your desk, is it messy or clean? Are there personal trinkets laying around? What do you think your desk says about you? And ideally, what would you like for your desk to say about you?

2021-08-11.prompt: What fictional world would you like to take a vacation on?

2021-08-12.prompt: Do you think living a nomadic lifestyle, working fully remote, and traveling the world is worth the hassle? Why? Please indulge if you have done or are doing this.

2021-08-13.prompt: What is something fun you did that you'd never do again?

2021-08-16.prompt: Did you go to college? Where did you go? What did you major in?

2021-08-17.prompt: Bruce Wayne picked "Batman" as a way to take control of one of his biggest fears. If you went the same route, what would you be called?

2021-08-18.prompt: Link to a journal / newsletter / mailing list / online forum that you love. Why should we read / visit it?

2021-08-19.prompt: What's your go-to meal that you prepare for dinner?

2021-08-20.prompt: What would you choose to do with today if you had no responsibilities? Is there any part of that which you can actually build into your day?

2021-08-23.prompt: Are there plants in your office? Do you find value in plants? Alternately: how is your garden doing? Pictures welcome.

2021-08-24.prompt: What bad habit do you wish would magically disappear?

2021-08-25.prompt: Where do you get your news?

2021-08-26.prompt: Share a picture of what you are eating for lunch.

2021-08-27.prompt: What’s something you’ve been meaning to try but just haven't gotten around to it?

2021-08-30.prompt: What were your favorite television shows when you were growing up?

2021-08-31.prompt: Name your three desert island books.

2021-09-01.prompt: How often do you rearrange furniture at your home / home office? Did you do one recently or are you planning one soon?

2021-09-02.prompt: Find something to write with, and something to write on. Set a five minute timer. Draw something wherever you are now. Take a photo and post it here.

2021-09-03.prompt: Of the places you have lived or spent significant time, which one had the most pleasing view out the front door/main window/etc for you and why?

2021-09-06.prompt: What Is your favorite non-english phrase? Why?

2021-09-07.prompt: The wins are fun. This one is harder. Tell us about a time you messed up at work or on a project and what you learned.

2021-09-08.prompt: What’s your favorite piece of clothing you own/owned?

2021-09-09.prompt: Your name is an acronym now. What does it stand for?

2021-09-10.prompt: Do you do any journaling, either in your career or your outside-the-job life? If so, what do you record, and why?

2021-09-13.prompt: What do you wish you did differently in your twenties?

2021-09-14.prompt: Do you have a quote, phrase, saying or mantra that regularly influences your thinking or approach to problems, life or work?

2021-09-15.prompt: How do you know if you've had a good week? How do you know if you haven't had a good week?

2021-09-16.prompt: What would be your ideal way to spend the weekend?

2021-09-17.prompt: Do you think that aliens exist?

2021-09-20.prompt: Have you ever started your own business? If so, how did it go? If not, do you want to? What's stopping you?

2021-09-22.prompt: Marie Kondo talks about getting rid of stuff that no longer sparks joy, but that doesn’t always need to be possessions. What no longer sparks joy for you? What’s stopping you from letting it go?

2021-09-23.prompt: If you could have one superpower, what would it be?

2021-09-24.prompt: What's unique and adorable about your pet? Provide photo / video evidence.

2021-09-27.prompt: What fad or trend do you hope comes back?

2021-09-28.prompt: What book have you re-read more than any other?

2021-09-29.prompt: What is the best thing you have done, gotten done, or seen done in the last week-ish? e.g. gone skiing, released a cool feature, helped someone get a promotion, etc.

2021-09-30.prompt: What movie never gets old no matter how many times you've seen it?

2021-10-01.prompt: What was your first R-rated movie?

2021-10-04.prompt: What is something you are right about that is very controversial?

2021-10-05.prompt: If you owned a restaurant, what kind of food would it serve?

2021-10-06.prompt: If you suddenly became a master at woodworking, what would you make?

2021-10-07.prompt: What is one thing you're going to do differently this week versus last week?

2021-10-08.prompt: What do you hope never changes?

2021-10-11.prompt: It's often hard to apply theory to everyday life. What's one principle you're trying to consume in your day-to-day?

2021-10-13.prompt: What do you think about when you hear the word “classy”?

2021-10-14.prompt: What is the most interesting / memorable thing you've ever seen out of a window?

2021-10-15.prompt: You've got a ton of stuff on your plate in a somewhat prioritized "list". So, where do you keep this info? Saved locally on your computer, saved in Trello, in a notebook? Is it even a list? Or is it a mind map, drawing, haiku, etc?

2021-10-19.prompt: What's the best thing you've done recently to make someone else's life better?

2021-10-20.prompt: Would you ever consider living somewhere you've visited? Where would it be and how long would you live there?

2021-10-21.prompt: Your company has given you a paid sabbatical and tuition reimbursement for higher education for one calendar year. What do you study? Why?

2021-10-22.prompt: Did you finish your schoolwork ahead of time or right before it was due and how does that reflect on your approach to deadlines?

2021-10-25.prompt: You put a book on your boss's desk. What book is that and why?

2021-10-26.prompt: Ten years from now what do you think you'll regret doing too much of or too little of at this point in your life?

2021-10-27.prompt: What is something you didn't like but you are glad happened?

2021-10-28.prompt: If you could own one building, any building, what building would it be?

2021-10-29.prompt: What is something you think everyone should do at least once in their lives?

2021-11-01.prompt: Do you have a favorite game to play? Board game, video game, sports game, or something else? Why do you like it so much?

2021-11-02.prompt: What are two of your favorite snacks?

2021-11-03.prompt: Lunchtime. What is your team’s lunch culture? Do you do lunch together as a team? Do you work through lunch?

2021-11-05.prompt: If you could say one sentence to your pet and know they would understand it, what would you say?

2021-11-08.prompt: What one thing do you really want but can't afford yet?

2021-11-09.prompt: What is your favorite body of water? Why?

2021-11-10.prompt: What question do you wish people would ask you?

2021-11-11.prompt: What would you like to write a book about?

2021-11-12.prompt: When you become the all-powerful Imperial Ruler of the World, what's the first law that you'll implement?

2021-11-15.prompt: You wake up tomorrow and find out you've won 10 million on the lottery. What do you do?

2021-11-16.prompt: Do you like coffee? How do you take it? How much of it do you drink?

2021-11-17.prompt: If magic was real, what spell would you try to learn first?

2021-11-18.prompt: What home improvement project would you like to attempt?

2021-11-19.prompt: What skill have you learned recently that makes your life better?

2021-11-22.prompt: What is the next thing you intend to learn, and how do you plan to study it?

2021-11-23.prompt: What is your personality type? Feel free to describe yourself in your own words or there are many tests out there, e.g. <http://www.16personalities.com/free-personality-test>.

2021-11-24.prompt: Do you go somewhere specific when you need to focus? If so, where? Do you have different kinds of focus that you get from different environments? e.g. thinking while running, writing while in a coffee shop, coding while in complete silence, etc

2021-11-25.prompt: What is your threshold for accepting LinkedIn connections, and why?

2021-11-26.prompt: What are your best calendaring tips? Do you block certain days for certain activities? Practice defensive calendaring? Calendar down to small increments of time? Use particular calendaring tools?

2021-11-29.prompt: Have you ever had a "why didn't I start doing this sooner" moment? What was it? What was stopping you?

2021-11-30.prompt: What have you done recently that scared you? How did it turn out?

2021-12-01.prompt: We all customize our working environment a little. What useful tweaks have you made to your setup?

2021-12-02.prompt: If you were reincarnated, what creature would you hope to be in your next life?

2021-12-03.prompt: What’s the best way to start the day?

2021-12-06.prompt: If you were given one thousand acres of land that you didn't need to pay taxes on but couldn't sell, what would you do with it?

2021-12-07.prompt: Is a hotdog a sandwich? Why?

2021-12-08.prompt: What are some small things that make your day better?
